text: Race has many meanings in English. It can mean: *To go very fast – he raced to the store *A competition between people - the race for the US presidency *Racing, a competition about speed – the Tour de France is an important bicycle race *Race (biology), a group smaller than a species. Members of different races can have sex and make babies, but they are separate (usually because they live in different places) - a large race of birds lives on this island *Race (sociology), subdivision of the human species based on distinguishing physical characteristics that are passed on to succeeding generations. *Race (anthropology) groups humans are often divided into based on physical traits often common among shared ancestry. *The human race means all people - the human race is destroying the environment
title: Race
